name: Wellbe
description: Wellbe facilitates remarkable outcomes between patients and providers through its care automation platform. By guiding patients through every step of their acute care journey, whether orthopedics, bariatrics, cardiology, or any other, Wellbe improves preparation for the patient which results in less administrative work for clinical staff and better outcomes for all. Transforming healthcare is not a system or a process, it is a mindset. Everyone’s role is critical to success. When everyone has the access to easily perform their roles, the healthcare system achieves a state of Wellbeing.
Headline: Wellbeing connects and enables every member of the healthcare journey
ShortDescription: Guided Patient Journeys for Better Access and Navigation

enhanced_description: Wellbe, launched in 2009 and headquartered in Madison, WI, is described as a care automation platform designed to guide patients through every step of their acute care journeys, such as orthopedics, bariatrics, and cardiology. This system aims to improve patient preparation, reduce administrative burden for clinical staff, and lead to better patient outcomes. The platform emphasizes patient engagement, improved financial results, and increased staff efficiency and performance within healthcare settings. Despite its explicit focus on patient care in its core description and headline, Wellbe is categorized within HR's Total Rewards and Corporate Wellness software, with a stated business objective to improve employee happiness and engagement through employee well-being programs. Wellbe targets small, large, and global enterprises.
